backend/main.mo: Motoko canister storing wound entries per caller with photo blobs, questionnaire text, and generated reports; supports adding entries and retrieving sorted history.
feature_evidence.json: Feature-to-file mapping documenting implemented frontend features, related components, and test coverage metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing responsibilities of key frontend components, pages, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus a custom OKLCH color system for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes for new entries, history, details, and reports, wrapped with layout and toaster.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Shared layout with header navigation, outlet rendering, and a footer attribution.
frontend/src/components/wound/Disclaimer: Provides reusable medical disclaimer and privacy notice alert components.
frontend/src/components/wound/PhotoInput: Photo capture/upload component handling camera use, validation, preview, and retake/clear actions.
frontend/src/components/wound/photoUtils: Provides image file validation and a utility to convert files into Uint8Array buffers.
frontend/src/components/wound/Questionna: React form component that collects wound details and infection signs, updating parent callbacks when data or disclaimer status changes.
frontend/src/components/wound/report/gen: Generates a wound report JSON string with summary text, risk flags, guidance, and escalation advice based on questionnaire data.
frontend/src/components/wound/woundModel: Defines the QuestionnaireData interface and helper functions to serialize and deserialize questionnaire JSON.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity authentication context and provider with login, logout, and stored identity handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching wound history and adding new wound entries via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: TailwindCSS base and theme variables defining light and dark mode color tokens and global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts React, wrapping the app with query and identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryDetailPage.tsx: Displays details of a selected wound entry, including photo, questionnaire data, and generated report with risk indicators.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Displays wound history with loading, error, empty, and list states, and allows navigating to individual entries or creating new ones.
frontend/src/pages/NewWoundEntryPage.tsx: Handles creating a new wound entry including photo upload, questionnaire input, disclaimer acceptance, submitting to backend, and storing data for report display.
frontend/src/pages/ReportPage.tsx: Shows the generated wound report using stored submission data, including photo preview, risk flags, and medical disclaimers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, typography, animations, and scanning paths for styling.
project_state.json: Describes project metadata, feature implementations, and requirement tracking for the wound assessment app.
